components/supermarket/home/sidebar:
<nav class="navList navList--aside">
    {{{region name="home_sidebar_top--global"}}}
    {{{region name="home_sidebar_top"}}}
    {{#if page.sub_pages}}
        {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/subpages}}
    {{/if}}

    {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/categories-menu}}

    {{{region name="home_sidebar_below_menu--global"}}}
    {{{region name="home_sidebar_below_menu"}}}

    {{#if theme_settings.sidebar_shop_by_brand '>' 9}}
        {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/brands}}
    {{/if}}

    {{{region name="home_sidebar_below_brands--global"}}}
    {{{region name="home_sidebar_below_brands"}}}

    {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/recently-viewed-products}}

    {{#if theme_settings.homepage_blog_posts_position '===' 'sidebar'}}
    {{#if theme_settings.homepage_blog_posts_count '>' 0}}
        {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/blog posts=blog.recent_posts}}
    {{/if}}
    {{/if}}

    {{{region name="home_sidebar_bottom"}}}
    {{{region name="home_sidebar_bottom--global"}}}
</nav>
layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <script>
            {{!-- Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css --}}
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        </script>

        {{> components/common/polyfill-script }}
        <script>window.consentManagerTranslations = `{{{langJson 'consent_manager'}}}`;</script>

        {{!-- Load Lazysizes script ASAP so images will appear --}}
        <script>
            {{!-- Only load visible elements until the onload event fires, after which preload nearby elements. --}}
            window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {};
            window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;
        </script>

        <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js'}}"></script>

        <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/webfont/1.6.26/webfont.js"></script>

        <style type="text/css" media="screen, print">
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeBlack";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Black.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Black.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeBold";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Bold.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Bold.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeDark";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Dark.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Dark.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeInfra";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Infra.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Infra.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeLight";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Light.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Light.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeRegular";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Regular.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Regular.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeThin";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Thin.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Thin.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "MDNichromeUltra";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Ultra.woff'}}"), /* IE6-IE8 */
                url("{{cdn 'webdav:MDNichrome0.7-Ultra.woff2'}}"), /* Super Modern Browsers */
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansBlack";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Black.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansBlackItalic";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-BlackItalic.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansBold";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Bold.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansBoldItalic";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-BoldItalic.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansItalic";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Italic.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansLight";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Light.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansLightItalic";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-LightItalic.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansMediumItalic";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-MediumItalic.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansMedium";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Medium.otf'}}");
            }
            @font-face {
                font-family: "VulfSansRegular";
                src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:VulfSans-Regular.otf'}}");
            }
        </style>
        <script>
            WebFont.load({
                custom: {
                    families: ['Quicksand', 'Poppins', 'Roboto', 'Open Sans', 'Noto Sans', 'Lato', 'Montserrat', 'Source Sans Pro', 'Oswald', 'Raleway', 'PT Sans', 'Merriweather', 'Nunito', 'Rubik', 'Lora', 'Josefin Sans', 'Kulim Park',
                        'MDNichromeBlack', 'MDNichromeBold', 'MDNichromeDark', 'MDNichromeInfra', 'MDNichromeLight', 'MDNichromeRegular', 'MDNichromeThin', 'MDNichromeUltra',
                        'VulfSansBlack', 'VulfSansBlackItalic', 'VulfSansBold', 'VulfSansBoldItalic', 'VulfSansItalic', 'VulfSansLight', 'VulfSansLightItalic', 'VulfSansMediumItalic', 'VulfSansMedium', 'VulfSansRegular']
                },
                classes: false
            });
        </script>

        {{getFontsCollection}}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}

        {{#if theme_settings.delayrecaptcha}}
            {{> components/supermarket/common/delay-recaptcha-script}}
        {{/if}}

        {{{head.scripts}}}


        {{!-- Theme settings: --}}
        {{~inject 'add_to_cart_popup' theme_settings.add_to_cart_popup}}
        {{~inject 'redirect_cart' theme_settings.redirect_cart}}
        {{~inject 'alsobought_thumbnail_size' theme_settings.alsobought_thumbnail_size}}
        {{~inject 'pdp_price_label' theme_settings.pdp-price-label}}
        {{~inject 'pdp_sale_price_label' theme_settings.pdp-sale-price-label}}
        {{~inject 'pdp_non_sale_price_label' theme_settings.pdp-non-sale-price-label}}
        {{~inject 'pdp_retail_price_label' theme_settings.pdp-retail-price-label}}
        {{~inject 'alsobought_checked' theme_settings.alsobought_checked}}
        {{~inject 'homepage_show_carousel' theme_settings.homepage_show_carousel}}
        {{~inject 'product_new_count' theme_settings.product_new_count}}
        {{~inject 'product_featured_count' theme_settings.product_featured_count}}
        {{~inject 'product_top_count' theme_settings.product_top_count}}
        {{~inject 'homepage_blog_posts_count' theme_settings.homepage_blog_posts_count}}
        {{~inject 'sidebar_shop_by_brand' theme_settings.sidebar_shop_by_brand}}
        {{~inject 'productpage_videos_count' theme_settings.productpage_videos_count}}
        {{~inject 'productpage_reviews_count' theme_settings.productpage_reviews_count}}
        {{~inject 'productpage_related_products_count' theme_settings.productpage_related_products_count}}
        {{~inject 'productpage_similar_by_views_count' theme_settings.productpage_similar_by_views_count}}
        {{~inject 'categorypage_products_per_page' theme_settings.categorypage_products_per_page}}
        {{~inject 'brandpage_products_per_page' theme_settings.brandpage_products_per_page}}
        {{~inject 'categorypage_search' theme_settings.categorypage_search}}
        {{~inject 'categorypage_search_subs' theme_settings.categorypage_search_subs}}
        {{~inject 'instantload' theme_settings.instantload}}
        {{~inject 'navPages_animation' theme_settings.navPages_animation}}
        {{~inject 'navPages_standard' theme_settings.navPages_standard}}
        {{~inject 'show_bulk_order_mode' theme_settings.show_bulk_order_mode}}
        {{~inject 'swatch_option_display_type' theme_settings.swatch_option_display_type}}
        {{~inject 'zoom_size' theme_settings.zoom_size}}
        {{~inject 'product_size' theme_settings.product_size}}
        {{~inject 'product_image_responsive' theme_settings.product_image_responsive}}
        {{~inject 'restrict_to_login' theme_settings.restrict_to_login}}
        {{!-- // --}}
        {{~inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
        {{~inject 'maintenanceMode' settings.maintenance}}
        {{~inject 'urls' urls}}
        {{~inject 'secureBaseUrl' settings.secure_base_url}}
        {{~inject 'cartId' cart_id}}
        {{~inject 'template' template}}
        {{~inject 'pageType' page_type}}
        {{~inject 'validationDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_messages')}}
        {{~inject 'validationFallbackDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_fallback_messages')}}
        {{~inject 'validationDefaultDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_default_messages')}}
        {{~inject 'ajaxAddToCartEnterQty' (lang 'bulk_order.validate.enter_qty')}}
        {{~inject 'bulkOrderEnterQty' (lang 'bulk_order.validate.enter_qty')}}
        {{~inject 'compareAddonLang_compare' (lang 'common.compare')}}
        {{~inject 'compareAddonLang_quick_view' (lang 'products.quick_view')}}
        {{~inject 'compareAddonLang_remove' (lang 'compare.remove')}}
        {{~inject 'compareAddonLang_clear_all' (lang 'compare.clear_all')}}
        {{~inject 'categoryId' category.id}}
        {{inject 'loadingImg' (cdn 'img/loading.svg')}}
        {{inject 'money' settings.money}}
        {{inject 'graphQLToken' settings.storefront_api.token}}
        {{#if theme_settings.alsobought_position '!==' 'disable'}}
            {{inject 'loginUrl' urls.auth.login}}
            {{inject 'activeCurrencyCode' currency_selector.active_currency_code}}
            {{inject 'defaultCurrencyCode' currency_selector.default_currency_code}}
            {{inject 'defaultProductImage' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}
            {{inject 'priceWithTaxTxt' (lang 'products.price_with_tax' tax_label=settings.tax_label)}}
            {{inject 'priceWithoutTaxTxt' (lang 'products.price_without_tax' tax_label=settings.tax_label)}}
            {{inject 'includingTaxTxt' (lang 'products.including_tax')}}
            {{inject 'excludingTaxTxt' (lang 'products.excluding_tax')}}
            {{inject 'chooseOptionsTxt' (lang 'products.choose_options')}}
            {{inject 'loginForPriceTxt' (lang 'products.login_for_price')}}
            {{inject 'txtAlsoBoughtNumberArray' (lang 'also_bought.number_array')}}
            {{inject 'txtAlsoBoughtAllNumberArray' (lang 'also_bought.all_number_array')}}
        {{/if}}
        {{inject 'txtSelectOne' (lang 'products.select_one')}}
        {{~inject 'customerRecentlyViewedProductIds' (pluck customer.recently_viewed_products.items 'id')}}
        {{~inject 'customerId' customer.id}}
        {{~inject 'graphQLToken' settings.storefront_api.token}}
        {{~inject 'currencyCode' currency_selector.active_currency_code}}
        {{{snippet 'htmlhead'}}}
    </head>
    <body class="csscolumns supermarket-layout--{{theme_settings.layout}}
        supermarket-style--{{theme_settings.style}}
        {{#startsWith 'account' page_type}}supermarket-pageType--account{{/startsWith}}
        supermarket-pageType--{{dashcase page_type}}
        supermarket-page--{{dashcase template}}
        {{#if theme_settings.hide_content_navigation}}supermarket--hideContentNav{{/if}}
        {{#if product_results.faceted_search_enabled}}has-faceted{{/if}}
        {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}}has-faceted{{/if}}
        {{#if brands.faceted_search_enabled}}has-faceted{{/if}}
        {{#if brand.faceted_search_enabled}}has-faceted{{/if}}
        {{#if result_count '>' 0}}has-result{{/if}}
        " id="topOfPage">

        {{{snippet 'header'}}}

        <svg data-src="{{cdn 'img/icon-sprite.svg'}}" class="icons-svg-sprite"></svg>

        {{> components/common/header }}
        {{> components/common/body }}
        {{> components/common/footer }}

        <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js'}}"></script>
        <script>
            {{!-- Exported in app.js --}}
            window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
        </script>

        {{!-- Third-party widgets advanced settings --}}
        <script>
            if (typeof window.PapaThemesWidgetCustomerReviewsExtraSettings !== 'object') {
                window.PapaThemesWidgetCustomerReviewsExtraSettings = {};
            }
            window.PapaThemesWidgetCustomerReviewsExtraSettings.slidesToShow = {{{theme_settings.widget_reviews_slides}}};
        </script>

        {{#if theme_settings.show_yotpo}}
            {{> components/yotpo/footer-script}}
        {{/if}}

        {{{footer.scripts}}}
        {{{snippet 'footer'}}}
    </body>
</html>

components/common/polyfill-script:
<script>
    {{!--
        Check for modern browser features, and load polyfills if browser does not appear to support features
        we need.

            Polyfill approach is all or nothing - please import needed polyfills in /assets/js/polyfills.js

        Inspired by https://philipwalton.com/articles/loading-polyfills-only-when-needed/
            --}}
    function browserSupportsAllFeatures() {
        return window.Promise
            && window.fetch
            && window.URL
            && window.URLSearchParams
            && window.WeakMap
            // object-fit support
            && ('objectFit' in document.documentElement.style);
    }

    function loadScript(src) {
        var js = document.createElement('script');
        js.src = src;
        js.onerror = function () {
            console.error('Failed to load polyfill script ' + src);
        };
        document.head.appendChild(js);
    }

    if (!browserSupportsAllFeatures()) {
        loadScript('{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.polyfills.js'}}');
    }
</script>
<!-- preload polyfill -->

components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}
